data.md:MetaData: Pollen profile FANGO08, Le Fango, France
Marsh. Local vegetation: Vitis and Clematis vitalbaMarsh formed behind gravel bar in forest at mouth of Fango river. Surrounding vegetation: Alnus, Osmunda regalis.
New pollen-analytical researches in Corsica: the problem of Qercus ilex L. and Erica arborea L., the origin of Pinus halepensis Miller forests
